Posts.EditableText:
I just checked the progress of the editor. Really fine work, Alex!

Will it be possible to sort the object-tree or to move objects up and down?
Posts.HTML:
I just checked the progress of the editor. Really fine work, Alex!

Will it be possible to sort the object-tree or to move objects up and down?

Posts.EditableText: Yes this is a planned feature. I've added it to the Issue Tracker so I don't forget: http://quest.codeplex.com/workitem/618
Posts.HTML: Yes this is a planned feature. I've added it to the Issue Tracker so I don't forget: http://quest.codeplex.com/workitem/618

Posts.EditableText: A work around is to edit the XML to get them in the right order.
Posts.HTML: A work around is to edit the XML to get them in the right order.

Posts.EditableText: This feature was implemented in beta 4, so a workaround should no longer be necessary - I hope!
Posts.HTML: This feature was implemented in beta 4, so a workaround should no longer be necessary - I hope!
